import React, {useState} from 'react'; import 'components/ImageAnimation/images/main.scss'; import './elipse.css'; import Swiper, {ReactIdSwiperProps} from "react-id-swiper"; import SwiperSlide from "swiper" export const Main = () => { const params: ReactIdSwiperProps = { mousewheel: true, containerClass: 'swiper-container hero-slider', parallax: true, centeredSlides: true, grabCursor: true, speed: 500, spaceBetween: 0, effect: 'slide' }; const [slide, setSlide] = useState(0); // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/ban-ts-ignore // @ts-ignore function checkKey(e) { if (e.keyCode === 38) { setSlide(slide - 1); } else if (e.keyCode === 40) { setSlide(slide + 1); } } return ( <>
checkKey(e)}>
